Row.Text: Assyrian Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Royal Library and Citadel in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production for each [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Work on display in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production for each [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Work on display in this Settlement.
Assyrian Unique Science Building. +3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Has 2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex slots. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Rivers and Wonders. Ageless.

Assyrian Unique Production and Fortification Building. +3 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Flat Terrain. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Wonders. Ageless. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.

+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Flat Terrain.[N][B]Effect:[/B] Acts as a [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.[N]Assyrian Unique Building.
